Description:
MUST SELL - 8 ACRES - HISTORIC CLUNES
Ill health forces sale of this great weekender or small permanent home. Walking distance to Clunes township, with town water & permanent creek running through, ideal for stock or serenity. With two bedrooms, lounge & separate dining area, a galley style kitchen with gas appliances including heating. An enclosed rear porch is handy for storage, with great garaging & an open machinery shed - even a small orchard. Grab a bargain now.
Auction - 20 August 2011 @ 11:30am
Clunes locationLow maintenanceIdeal for horses
Insights: 100 Learmonth Rd, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2019 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Attractive 20 Acres At Clunes With 12000 Litre Tank
American style barn measuring 30 x 20 foot in an elevated, private position with spendid country views. The barn with permit has a concrete floor and STCA build your dream home in this low density residential zone. There is also a hayshed, small sheep yards with loading ramp and deer shed. The land is mostly cleared. Please note power is not connected, but is available. The 20 acres (8ha) approx includes 4 main paddocks that have been improved, 4 dry dams & town water supplies a trough for the stock via Roses Lane. The block sits high and dry with views to the south.

Address: Cobar Park Mount Cameron Road CLUNES VIC 3370
Description:
449HA (1,109.57 Acres) - VERSATILE COUNTRY - VOLCANIC SOILS
Featuring two weatherboard homes (One in need of attention and all other necessary sheds, including woolshed and yards, barn, machinery shed and cattle yards, Cobar Park includes 202 Meg ground water licence, pumping from bores to a central dam and also pumps to a Centre Pivot Spray, one pump at 6000GPH and another at 3000GPH. Pastures include Clovers, Rye, Phalaris and Cocksfoot and are showing recovery following recent district rains

Description:
"Scale Park" 104 Acres, Must Be Sold - Bidding to start at $330,000
For Sale Now or at Auction. Bidding to start at $330,000. Located between Creswick and Clunes is this great property which offers an opportunist buyer the chance to purchaser a property with loads of potential at a very competitive price. The three bedroom art deco home is roomy and comfortable it has both town water and tank water connected. Outside working improvements include shearing, hay and machinery sheds and work shops plus steel cattle yards. The rich volcanic soil with creek and black turf lends itself to many rural pursuits.
Insights: 17 other 3 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
Massive 5 bedroom home overlooking Clunes Township
Big and spacious is the best way to describe this home of 30 squares. The elevated block is flat but enjoys views over the Clunes Township and is a short walk to the main street. The home boasts 5 bedrooms, 3 with built in robes, and the master features a full ensuite with walk in robe. The 3 living zones consist of a large family/meals area, separate lounge room with bay window and spacious rumpus room ideal for the kids. Other features include ducted vacuum, 9 foot ceilings, split system heating & cooling, solar hot water and tank water direct to the kitchen sink. Windows on the north side of the home are all double glazed. Town water & sewerage are connected to the home plus a large block of approximately 2100m² (half acre) provides room to move. Double carport and large 12 x 8 metre shed is ideal for extra storage & a 22,500 litre tank in place.
Insights: 3 other 5 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
4 BEDROOMS - 3 ACRE PARKLAND BLOCK - CLUNES
One of a kind on a picturesque block, this comfortable family home is sure to impress. Features include 4 bedrooms, 2 with BIR's, ensuite to master with WIR, north facing formal lounge room with split air system, formal dining room. Great kitchen/dining/family area with split air system & new slow combustion heater. New Fisher & Paykel electric fan forced wall oven, dishwasher, plenty of cupboard space. Outside includes sensational undercover entertaining area, established low maintenance gardens with Old River red gum trees, double steel garage & sundry shedding, town water, plenty of room for the kids to play, school bus at front door. Inspection a must.
Price: $310,000 - $330,000
David Cranage 0419 349 130

Description:
The serenity of acres on the fringe of Clunes.
This quaint home proudly sits on an attractive 10 acre allotment. Whether a horse lover or just require a little bit of space for your sanity this parcel can grant you the lifestyle you desire. The home is solid and straight but requires your very own personal touch. It holds 3 spacious bedrooms which all have outlooks over the countryside. Those loving polished floors will love the hardwood timber floor. The other improvements to the property include shedding, stables and a dam. This lovely lifestyle is found on the fringe of Clunes having you only 4 minutes to the heart of town.
Insights: 35 Fawcett Drive, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2011 and 17 other 3 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Period Home on Large Allotment in Historic Township
This beautiful Victorian abode is sure to cause a fuss. Set high and dry in the hills of the Clunes town-ship this delighted home has ever so much potential. An extremely roomy three bedroom residence, there is great living space with two lounge zones and if size matters, the kitchen will overwhelm you. The home is blessed with wondrous period features including original fireplace and pressed metal ceilings. The dwelling sits proudly on an enormous allotment that holds great potential. A rare beauty in a historic locale.
Insights: 6 West street, Clunes VIC 3370 was last sold in 2011 and 17 other 3 bedroom house in Clunes have recently been sold.

Description:
Historical Renovated Cottage, Circa 1850's on 4 Acres
Situated in the small country hamlet of Glendaruel between Mt Beckworth and Mt Bolton. 25 Minutes drive to Ballarat, 10 minutes to Clunes and 15 minutes to the Western Freeway via Miners Rest. Former post office consists of 4 bedrooms and 2 separate living rooms. Original features include polished floor boards, open fireplace, galley style kitchen with larder room and large meals area. There is an updated bathroom with toilet. Outside offers a quality 2 roomed studio with split system heating, land area of approx 4 acres with 2 grazing paddocks, numerous fruit trees including apple, nectarine, peach, plum and a cottage garden. Sundry shedding, garage with direct house entry, 44000 litres of tank water and a meandering creek complete the lifestyle.
Insights: 11 other 4 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
Massive Home In Picturesque Gardens At Clunes
This beautiful 32 square home is positioned in the heart of Clunes and is amongst gorgeous gardens. The home consists of 3 large living areas, one of which is an adjoining beautiful kitchen/dining with granite bench tops. There are 3 bedrooms, main has huge WIR's and ensuite with twin vanity plus another separate bathroom and toilet.The property has evaporate cooling, central gas heating, wood heating, north facing windows, solar hot water and is fully water sufficient.
Outside consists of 7m x 12m garage and a fantastic outdoor entertaining area. There are 3 water tanks with the capacity of 54,000 litres and the property has town sewerage. The property is only 3 years old and is postioned on a 3500 square metre block. A must to see to appreciate this property!
Insights: 17 other 3 bedroom house in CLUNES have recently been sold.

Description:
"Netherbury" - CICA 1880 Home - Historic Clunes
This picture does not lie. This home is picture perfect with exceptional attention to detail presentation, period charm and character and a great location in a leafy tree lined street. Plenty of history with the main home dating back to the late 1800's with a 1920's extension. Many original features including 9" polished floor boards plus inviting sunny entertaining areas. Plenty of room with 3 or 4 bedrooms, 2 or 3 living areas, updated bathroom and kitchen plus delightfully landscaped gardens all on a 1000 sq metre allotment. "Netherbury" is a fine example of the warmth and charm that only period homes of that era can offer. An inspection will not disappoint.
Price: $320,000 to $360,000
Geoff Sullivan 0428 503 423

Description:
Weekend Getaway - 6 Lifestyle Acre - Clunes
Escape the hussle and bussle of city living with this delightful 6 acre property located just minutes to Clunes. With stunning views of the surrounding country side and mountains as a back drop, this property is ideal for a country weekend getaway or superb home site. Add a 12m x 12m shed with concrete floor which is separated into two areas and a loft, giving endless uses. This country alotment at this price is a must see property for the buyer wanting views, location and an existing shed with many options. Return to nature or connect to the passing power or phone, the choice is yours. Phone now to arrange a time to inspect this classic country lifestyle property.
$148,000 - $168,000

Description:
‘Mirrengatta’: 27 hectares of tranquil bushland
This retreat is the stuff dreams are made of! Tucked away on the edge of a State forest natural bush reserve, here is a pristine landscape of towering eucalypts, rare native flora and open grassland which has never been farmed or grazed. ‘Mirrengatta’ has been justly extolled by a well known Ballarat field naturalist, birdwatcher & writer as ‘a Garden of Eden’. The land is home to wildflowers, indigenous orchids and native groundcovers; some 190 species of bird life are known to visit, along with black wallabies and black kangaroos. This remarkable property, which includes a large lake and a dam, has current planning permission for a residence/studio. Seize this seldom-found opportunity to build an ecologically sustainable weekender or permanent residence in a place of unspoilt natural beauty, only 7 km from the historic township of Clunes, close to Ballarat, Daylesford and the Central Goldfields, and within 90 minutes drive of the Melbourne CBD.
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

HOME ON 20 ACRES - CLUNES DISTRICT
Neat three bedroom brick veneer & timber home with native garden and double lock up garage, set on 20 acres, serviced by bore & tank water. Only 20 minutes to Ballarat. Currently leased @ $300 per week until 28th February, 2011. Arrange your inspection today.
Price $290,000 - $315,000

Description:
PICTURESQUE CLUNES - 8 LIFESTYLE ACRES
An opportunity to secure approximately 8 acres of fertile land on the outskirts of historic Clunes, complete with a comfortable, low maintenance three bedroom home. Three bay colorbond shed with lockup workshop, additional double garage, other sundry shedding, plus bore and town water. This picturesque block features a tree lined winter creek, bitumen road frontage and low density residential zoning. Escape to this country getaway property with inviting views and peace and quiet that only country living can offer.
Price $220,000 - $240,000
Helen Newall 0419 510 488

RESTORE & RENOVATE PART OF CLUNES HISTORY

Set On a huge corner allotment only 100 metres from the main street. If you have sought an opportunity to renovate and enjoy, here's the chance. Call today to avoid disappointment.
1 Ligar Street, Clunes
